#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(void) {
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		int g = n;
		int mx = 1;

		for (int i = 2; i * i <= n; ++i) {
			if (n % i == 0) {
				mx = i;
				while (n % i == 0) n /= i;
			}
		}
		
		if (n > 1) mx = n;

		cout << g / mx << '\n';
	}
}
